entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
